name: Preparation Ritual
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Spellbooks/Spellbooks/Journeyman Book of Rul Thaven (Level 9 Diviner)/Preparation Ritual

sections.body: You use a trick perfected by Rul Thaven to ferret out invisible creatures. Spend this boon's effect as a swift action. You gain the effects of see invisibility for 1 round.
sections.name: Eyes of Rul Thaven
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Spellbooks/Spellbooks/Journeyman Book of Rul Thaven (Level 9 Diviner)/Preparation Ritual/Eyes of Rul Thaven
